links.*: Of the Flight of the Noldor
Of the Return of the Noldor

wikitext.*:
{{ardayearheader|Year of the Trees 1492|Year of the Trees 1495|Year of the Trees 1496|Year of the Trees 1497|Year of the Trees 1498|Year of the Trees 1500|First Age 1}}

* [[Morgoth]] sends armies of [[Orcs]] to attack the [[Sindar|Elves]] of [[Beleriand]]. The [[First Battle|First Battle of Beleriand]]; the [[Havens of the Falas]] are besieged.<ref name="GA">{{GA|36-48}}, pp. 15-19</ref><ref name="Sindar">{{S|Sindar}}</ref>
* Death of [[Denethor (son of Lenwë)|Denethor]] at [[Amon Ereb]]. His people go into hiding in [[Ossiriand]] and are known as the [[Laiquendi]].<ref name="GA"/><ref name="Sindar"/>
* Melian casts a [[Girdle of Melian|Girdle]] over her realm; it becomes known as [[Doriath]].<ref name="GA"/><ref name="Sindar"/>
* Arrival of the Host of [[Fëanor]] at the [[Firth of Drengist]].<ref name="AA">{{AA|157-163}}, pp. 118-120</ref><ref name="Flight">{{S|Flight}}</ref> This occurred some seven sun years after Melian's raising the Girdle.<ref>{{GA|41}}</ref>
* The burning of the ships at [[Losgar]]; the host of [[Fingolfin]] are forced to cross the [[Helcaraxë]] to reach [[Middle-earth]].<ref name="AA"/><ref name="Flight"/>
* Establishment of the camp at the shores of the [[Lake Mithrim]] by the [[House of Fëanor|Fëanorians]].<ref name="GA"/><ref name="Return">{{S|Return}}</ref>
* Second battle of Beleriand: [[Dagor-nuin-Giliath]].<ref name="GA"/><ref name="Return"/>
* Death of [[Fëanor]] at hands of [[Gothmog (balrog)|Gothmog]] and the [[Balrogs]].<ref name="GA"/><ref name="Return"/>
* [[Maedhros]] feigns to treat with [[Morgoth]], but is attacked and captured.<ref name="Return"/><ref>{{GA|49-50}}, p. 29</ref>

==Other versions of the legendarium==
* Death of [[Amrod]].<ref name="AA"/><ref>{{MR|P2o}}, p. 128</ref><ref>{{PM|XNotes}}, Note 7, pp. 317-8</ref><ref>{{PM|XI}}, pp. 352-355</ref>
